name: Paradise Lost (itch) (alexanderminhle)
description:
Kneel Handstrong is a blob lifeform who lived on the moon and witnessed the landing of Apollo 11. Since then, they have strived to discover a new planet. Kneel takes off to the skies and suddenly crash-lands on a planet that's seemingly devoid of life. Kneel journeys through the ruins to find any sign of life and meet them.
